__e: Do you want a lawyer who thinks you're innocent and loses or a lawyer who doesn't want to know and wins?
This could be a totally innocent situation, and then we've done all this what-iffing for nothing.
There are two things. First, I know I'm innocent. Second, I always believe that in two weeks I'll be released.
I get it. You see yourself in her. A poor innocent who gets screwed by someone else's bad choices.
Lord, I'm no innocent girl... Behaving good...
